authors_year.description: First author and year. Use the title and PMID context if necessary.

mri_modality.description: MRI modality (e.g., rs-fMRI, T1-weighted). Specify if 'resting state' or 'task-based'. Return 'NR' (Not Reported) if missing.

mri_field_strength.description: Field strength (e.g., 3T). If not in abstract, search for common hardware mentions. Return 'NR' if missing.

mri_fu_time.description: All follow-up time points mentioned (e.g., 'Baseline, 2d, 10d post-infusion'). Return 'NR' if missing.

mri_analysis_task.description: Specific analysis method (e.g., Seed-based correlation, ICA, ALFF). Include the specific seed if mentioned. Return 'NR' if missing.

mri_roi.description: Specific ROIs or networks targeted (e.g., DMN, Insula, Salience Network). Return 'NR' if missing.

n_trd.description: Number of MDD/TRD participants. Distinguish between 'Total' and 'Analyzed' if possible. Return 'NR' if missing.

n_hc.description: Number of healthy controls. Return 'NR' if missing.

age_trd.description: Mean (SD) or range for MDD group. Return 'NR' if missing.

age_hc.description: Mean (SD) or range for HC group. Return 'NR' if missing.

sex_trd.description: Sex distribution (e.g., % Female or M/F count) for MDD group. Return 'NR' if missing.

sex_hc.description: Sex distribution for HC group. Return 'NR' if missing.

illness_duration.description: Duration of illness in years. Check for 'unmedicated' status. Return 'NR' if missing.

diagnostic_instrument.description: Tool used for diagnosis (e.g., SCID, MINI). Look for 'unmedicated' or 'TRD' qualifiers. Return 'NR' if missing.

diagnostic_criteria.description: Criteria used (e.g., DSM-IV, DSM-5). Return 'NR' if missing.

trd_criteria.description: Definition of TRD or MDD severity (with number of failed treatments if available). Return 'NR' if missing.

suicidality.description: Any mention of suicidal ideation or exclusion/inclusion based on it. Return 'NR' if missing.

comorbidities.description: Mention of comorbid anxiety, substance use, etc. or if comorbidities are excluded. Return 'NR' if missing.

scale_depression.description: Primary depression scale used (e.g., MADRS, HAM-D). Return 'NR' if missing.

scale_other.description: Secondary scales (e.g., CADSS for dissociation, BPRS). Return 'NR' if missing.

outcome_definition.description: How response was defined clinically, even if not linked directly to MRI. Return 'NR' if missing.

ketamine_route.description: Administration route (e.g., IV, IN, IM). Return 'NR' if missing.

ketamine_dosing.description: Dose (e.g., 0.5 mg/kg) and frequency/duration of infusion. Return 'NR' if missing.

significant_regions.description: List all regions with significant p-values or effects (e.g., Insula, Thalamus). Return 'NR' if missing.

direction_of_change.description: Direction relative to HC or Baseline. Use terms like 'Normalized', 'Increased', 'Decreased', or 'Transient'. Return 'NR' if missing.

mri_white_matter_tracts.description: If DWI, specify: SLF, ILF, Cingulum Bundle, Forceps Minor, UF, or Internal Capsule. Return 'NR' if missing.

direction_and_outcome.description: Direction of MRI feature relative to clinical outcome. Use format: [MRI Metric] [Direction (Increase/Decrease)] correlates with [Clinical Symptom (Depression/Anhedonia/Rumination/Suicidality)] [Direction].

item_level_symptom.description: Was the finding linked to a specific symptom? (e.g., Anhedonia, Rumination, Suicidal Ideation, Cognitive symptoms). Return 'NR' if missing.
